DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering effect of two iStent devices in eyes of subjects with primary open-angle glaucoma
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Open-Angle Glaucoma Subjects on One Topical Hypotensive Medication Treated With Two iStents
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of two iStents implanted in primary open-angle glaucoma subjects
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with primary openangle glaucoma (POAG) Subject on one topical hypotensive medication Traumatic, uveitic, neovascular, or angle closure glaucoma Fellow eye already enrolled
